New Records: Virat Kohli surpassed Sachin Tendulkar's record of most ODI centuries
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli made a record-breaking 50th ODI century
Mohammed Shami took a five-wicket haul and later seven wickets
Shreyas Iyer reached his century off just 67 deliveries
KL Rahul and Shreyas Iyer cleared the rope to take India to their mammoth total
Kane Williamson and Daryl Mitchell's partnership looked promising but ultimately fell short
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said it was a special moment to surpass Sachin Tendulkar's record
Kane Williamson praised India's performance, saying they played outstandingly well throughout the competition
Miscellaneous Highlights: India advanced to the home World Cup final with victory over New Zealand
India are undefeated at this World Cup
The win means India will enter their first final at the tournament since they won the title in 2011
India will face either Australia or South Africa in the final
Others: The pitch was not mentioned as a significant factor in the match, but it was noted that the Himalayan fog affected India's match against New Zealand earlier in the tournament
